import axios from "axios"; import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; const DeleteMultiple = () => { const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { axios.get("http://localhost:3006/user") .then((res) => { res.data && setUsers(res.data) }) .catch((err) => { console.log(err); }) }, 3000) }, []) return ( <>
